creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by Amy Kasai
description: abstract image with mostly brown background with overlapping brown, tan, and lavender forms; large green oval form near bottom with intersecting wavy brown line; black spot in oval; black square in brown background at R
medium: Color woodblock print; ink and colors on paper
signed: in pencil, LLC: [Tea Ceremony Room/Rikio Takahashi/1963]
title: Tea Ceremony Room
